The best on android so far. No ads and free. Well to be honest, why don't you put a price tag as long you keep the ads away. And asking no permission is another plus. I've a large screen phone, probably you could give us options to resize the main box and move it to right-bottom corner of my screen so i can play it with 1 hand
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for the review. My new app Fifteen has a feature to resize and move the game field. I will think about adding sounds too.

google_play_reviews.content: Great, what more can a person ask for. Thanks alot for this!
Simple and excellent.

It's a nice puzzle. I'm giving a 3-star rating because it is hard / frustrating for me to slide the tiles quickly. They seem sluggish and often don't detect or follow my touch. It causes me to make errors in movement and I have to try again. One factor may be that it doesn't have enough tolerance for finger movement that isn't precisely horizontal or vertical. I have another slide puzzle that doesn't have this issue. I hope the developer can fix this.

Best app I've seen, been using it for a while. Love the minimal style, helps me focus.
No ads. It's very simple, but an awesome game. You can change the size of the game square. It keeps records of time or move counts. Honestly it's simple, but it's great.
Me encanta que casi no pesa nada

Amazing app! Love all the options and stats. One suggestion for a future update: I wish the move counter counted taps instead of tiles moved. If you tap several tiles away from a black tile to move several at once, it ups the move counter by however many tiles moved. This also throws off TPS (turns per second) in my mind because I think of that more as clicks/taps per second, not purely tiles moved.
So many features, Zero Ads, and the whole pack is under 100 KB !!... Dear dev, take my bow 🙇
Very reactive, fast, plenty of variability as it lets you go up to 10x10 patterns! My highscore on 10x10 is 16 minutes, you should try to beat it!

This could be the perfect 15 Puzzle app. First, there's no ads, and no permissions required! Second, game play is perfect. You can move a single block or a line of blocks with a single tap. It makes it impossible to play competitively, if you're into that... so frustrating for an almost perfect fame.

google_play_reviews.content: Great version of the original plastic which I also have. Moving the tiles is a lot easier. Note that the "snake" can't be solved on the plastic. That's due to the mathematic principles. The card mount shows 6 versions which could be used. Having the ability to change the size was a terrific idea. Others don't do that.

Best thing is that this app is super lite. Almost no space but great features. Even there are no ads and more options. I have seen many puzzle apps but this is really great. Thanks to the developer.

Very nice already, but there's always room for improvement. I would love to see a color picker for the theme or at least more colours. More modes would be nice, such as spiral and vertical and horizontal mirror modes for all patterns. Spiral: 01-02-03-04 12-13-14-05 11-00-15-06 10-09-08-07
Great, and no  ads.
What's snake mode??
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
You can see an example of solved "Snake mode" game on the screenshot (titled "Snake Mode").
For 4x4, the goal is to arrange tiles in the following order:
1-2-3-4
8-7-6-5
9-10-11-12
_-15-14-13
Left to right, then right to left, then left to right and so on.
